Video striming¶

1.¶

url: webrtc/cameraOn

Turn camera ON.

Set

profile.is_camera = True

Publish data to socket to broadcust all users for updating user`s profile.

data = { ‘task’: ‘update_user’, ‘user’: {profile.id: user_serializer(profile)} } redis_client.publish(‘notifications’, json.dumps(data))

Response({‘camera_on’: ‘ok’})

2.¶

url: webrtc/cameraOff

Turn camera ON.

Set

profile.is_camera = False

Publish data to socket to broadcust all users for updating user`s profile.

data = { ‘task’: ‘update_user’, ‘user’: {profile.id: user_serializer(profile)} } redis_client.publish(‘notifications’, json.dumps(data))

Response({‘camera_off’: ‘ok’})

3.¶

url: webrtc/cameraShow

CameraShowView¶

Show abonent video

Input

room_id (request.data[‘room’][‘id’]) abonent_id (request.data[‘abonent’][‘id’])

room.is_video = True

Create Connection object. Connection.create_con_if_not_exist(owner,abonent,room)

Broatcast to woman`s sockets

for sock in abonent.get_socket_ids():

‘action’: ‘server-action:show_cam’ ‘user_id’: request.data[‘abonent’][‘id’],

webrtc.views.OfferView¶

Get offer from abonent after click Show cam button.

con.set_offer(json.dumps(request.data[‘offer’]))

broadcust to all socket connections

for uo in UserOnline.objects.filter(user=abonent):

‘action’: ‘server-action:put_offer’

webrtc.models.Connection.set_offer¶

Setting offer to connection.

webrtc.views.AnswerView¶

url: /webrtc/answer

Getting answer from owner

Input

request.data[‘room_id’]

request.data[‘offer’]

webrtc.views.IceView¶

url: /webrtc/ice

Get ice

dating
